experience.title: Human Resources Executive
experience.description:
Currently working as an Executive ‚Äì Human Resource, primarily handling sourcing and screening of candidates for various roles. Responsible for end-to-end recruitment support including:

	‚Ä¢	Sourcing potential candidates through job portals like Naukri and LinkedIn

	‚Ä¢	Screening resumes based on job requirements and shortlisting suitable profiles

	‚Ä¢	Coordinating telephonic interviews and follow-ups with shortlisted candidates

	‚Ä¢	Maintaining candidate databases and tracking hiring progress using internal tools

	‚Ä¢	Supporting the HR team in achieving weekly and monthly hiring targets


Gaining hands-on experience in high-volume recruitment and developing a strong understanding of talent acquisition processes.
experience.description_html:
Currently working as an Executive – Human Resource, primarily handling sourcing and screening of candidates for various roles. Responsible for end-to-end recruitment support including:
• Sourcing potential candidates through job portals like Naukri and LinkedIn
• Screening resumes based on job requirements and shortlisting suitable profiles
• Coordinating telephonic interviews and follow-ups with shortlisted candidates
• Maintaining candidate databases and tracking hiring progress using internal tools
• Supporting the HR team in achieving weekly and monthly hiring targets

Gaining hands-on experience in high-volume recruitment and developing a strong understanding of talent acquisition processes.

experience.title: Assistant Customer Executive
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities:


Providing outstanding support to customers through various communication channels, including phone, email, and chat, to address inquiries, resolve issues, and offer product or service guidance.

Assisting the Customer Executive team in managing client accounts, ensuring smooth onboarding, and maintaining customer satisfaction.

Collaborating with cross-functional teams to address customer concerns and improve overall customer experience.

Managing and updating customer information and interactions in the company's CRM system.

Designed agent portals with search, dashboards, assignment algorithms, and lead pulling, reducing response latency by ~30%. ‚Ä¢ High-Load Reporting Optimization (ClickHouse, .NET): Migrated critical reporting pipelines from SQL Server to ClickHouse, lowering CPU utilization from 82% ‚Üí 29%, reducing database crashes by 90%, and significantly boosting uptime. ‚Ä¢ Renewal Callback Migration (Athena, APIs, Kafka, UnifyApps): Re-engineered the renewal callbacks workflow into a scalable event-driven pipeline, decoupling from legacy systems and improving system reliability and observability. ‚Ä¢ Master Management System (Django, Python): Administered and scaled the enterprise MDM system (single source of truth for products & partners), ensuring 99.9%+ data consistency across multiple environments.
positions.title: SDE 1
positions.description_html:
• Claims Separation System – Full-Stack Development (.NET, React, SQL, MongoDB):
Built a centralized claims platform, separating motor and health workflows to improve scalability and reduce complexity. Designed agent portals with search, dashboards, assignment algorithms, and lead pulling, reducing response latency by ~30%.

• High-Load Reporting Optimization (ClickHouse, .NET):
Migrated critical reporting pipelines from SQL Server to ClickHouse, lowering CPU utilization from 82% → 29%, reducing database crashes by 90%, and significantly boosting uptime.

• Renewal Callback Migration (Athena, APIs, Kafka, UnifyApps):
Re-engineered the renewal callbacks workflow into a scalable event-driven pipeline, decoupling from legacy systems and improving system reliability and observability.

• Master Management System (Django, Python):
Administered and scaled the enterprise MDM system (single source of truth for products & partners), ensuring 99.9%+ data consistency across multiple environments.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ TL Dashboard ‚Äì Reporting Pipeline (ClickHouse, MongoDB, React): Built a reporting dashboard with heavy ClickHouse queries refreshed every 45 minutes. Introduced MongoDB caching, improving load times by 60%. ‚Ä¢ Lead Rejection System ( .NET, AWS S3, Athena, MongoDB ): Designed a modular rejection system replacing legacy SQL workflows, cutting rule-change effort by 70%. Automated nightly job scheduling and validated accuracy via A/B testing, improving lead conversion quality. ‚Ä¢ Agent Tracking System (React, .NET, SQL Server, Google Maps API): Implemented real-time field agent tracking with live map integration, reducing coordination delays by 25%.

recommendations: Parth Sarthi ‚Äú"Sometimes working on a cross company project, you find people who transition from becoming acquaintance to friends for life. Abhishek, is one such gem of a person.He is a great professional to work with. We worked together on a project in Future Generali where he was representing Policy Bazaar and had to provide an integral support for success of a novel product integration. He was always ready to put in the extra effort to make sure the project is completed without any issues and in lines of business timelines. To be honest, he was my go to tech guy in understanding Policy Bazaar- Future data sharing processes and tech architecture. This project was a novel 2 company, 2 product and 1 solution integration for Policy Bazaar marketplace platform and the result was a successful product launch which created benchmarks in industry. Thanks a lot, Abhishek! You are always a good catch for any organisation and as I keep saying, we will work together soon! Wish you success and glory! Cheers!"‚Äù

Abhinav Bansal ‚ÄúAbhishek is an exceptional Engineering manager with a rare combination of coding expertise, great problem-solving skills, and business intelligence. His focus is always to optimize the process whilst keeping bigger system architecture in mind. One of his strongest abilities is to communicate and come across fine-tuned details which greatly enhances the understanding experience. I highly recommend Abhishek for his ability to design large systems and to drive the product from inception to deployment. He proves to be a vital asset to any team.‚Äù

positions.title: Technical Associate
positions.description_html:
🚀 .NET Developer | Technical Associate at Policybazaar | C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core, SQL

As a .NET Developer at Policybazaar, I specialize in building robust, scalable, and high-performance applications using C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core, Web APIs, and SQL. Passionate about writing clean and efficient code.

📌 Leadership & Academic Involvement
Beyond coding, I have a strong background in leadership, having served as Vice President and Deputy Secretary, Discipline Head at ICFAI University, where I developed my ability to lead teams, organize events, and drive impactful initiatives.

🎓 Certifications & Continuous Learning
I hold multiple certifications that validate my knowledge in many fields like software development and backend technologies. My commitment to continuous learning ensures that I stay updated with industry trends and best practices.

💡 Let’s Connect!
I’m always open to discussions on .NET development, APIs, and software engineering best practices. If you’re looking to collaborate, exchange ideas, or explore opportunities, feel free to reach out!

experience.title: Vice President - Icfai Tech Council
experience.description:
üåü Vice President | Discipline Head | Deputy Secretary | Student Leadership | Sports Enthusiast


I have had the privilege of serving in multiple leadership roles during my time at ICFAI University, where I gained invaluable experience in team management, event organization, and strategic decision-making.


üîπ Vice President (Student Council): 

As the Vice President of the Icfai Tech, I worked closely with university leadership to ensure the smooth functioning of student affairs, while fostering a positive and productive environment for the student body. I led various initiatives aimed at improving student engagement, academic resources, and extracurricular activities.


üîπ Discipline Committee Member to Discipline Head: 

My journey began as a Discipline Committee Member, where I was involved in enforcing university rules and regulations. My performance led to my promotion to Discipline Head(Head of the Committee), where I was responsible for overseeing discipline-related activities and ensuring the welfare of students.


üîπ Deputy Secretary (Sports Club):

Currently, I serve as the Deputy Secretary for the University‚Äôs Sports Club of 5 Schools, contributing to the management and promotion of sports events, and helping build a vibrant sports culture on campus.


These roles have allowed me to develop strong leadership, organizational, and communication skills while giving me the opportunity to make a positive impact on the campus community.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description:
During my summer internship, I had the opportunity to work as both a Database Management Intern and a Backend Intern with a primary focus on MySQL. I gained hands-on experience in database management, including tasks such as query optimization, data structuring, and database maintenance.  


I also had the privilege of attending site meetings with the CEO, where I learned invaluable insights into project management, decision-making, and the overall business strategy. This direct exposure to leadership and operations helped me grow both technically and professionally.  


I contributed productively to various backend tasks, assisting with database-related queries, data integration, and backend development projects, which gave me a deeper understanding of backend architecture and data flow management.

positions.title: Technical Associate
positions.description_html:
🚀 .NET Developer | Technical Associate at Policybazaar | C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core, SQL

As a .NET Developer at Policybazaar, I specialize in building robust, scalable, and high-performance applications using C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core, Web APIs, and SQL. Passionate about writing clean and efficient code.

📌 Leadership & Academic Involvement
Beyond coding, I have a strong background in leadership, having served as Vice President and Deputy Secretary, Discipline Head at ICFAI University, where I developed my ability to lead teams, organize events, and drive impactful initiatives.

🎓 Certifications & Continuous Learning
I hold multiple certifications that validate my knowledge in many fields like software development and backend technologies. My commitment to continuous learning ensures that I stay updated with industry trends and best practices.

💡 Let’s Connect!
I’m always open to discussions on .NET development, APIs, and software engineering best practices. If you’re looking to collaborate, exchange ideas, or explore opportunities, feel free to reach out!

experience.title: Vice President - Icfai Tech Council
experience.description:
üåü Vice President | Discipline Head | Deputy Secretary | Student Leadership | Sports Enthusiast


I have had the privilege of serving in multiple leadership roles during my time at ICFAI University, where I gained invaluable experience in team management, event organization, and strategic decision-making.


üîπ Vice President (Student Council): 

As the Vice President of the Icfai Tech, I worked closely with university leadership to ensure the smooth functioning of student affairs, while fostering a positive and productive environment for the student body. I led various initiatives aimed at improving student engagement, academic resources, and extracurricular activities.


üîπ Discipline Committee Member to Discipline Head: 

My journey began as a Discipline Committee Member, where I was involved in enforcing university rules and regulations. My performance led to my promotion to Discipline Head(Head of the Committee), where I was responsible for overseeing discipline-related activities and ensuring the welfare of students.


üîπ Deputy Secretary (Sports Club):

Currently, I serve as the Deputy Secretary for the University‚Äôs Sports Club of 5 Schools, contributing to the management and promotion of sports events, and helping build a vibrant sports culture on campus.


These roles have allowed me to develop strong leadership, organizational, and communication skills while giving me the opportunity to make a positive impact on the campus community.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description:
During my summer internship, I had the opportunity to work as both a Database Management Intern and a Backend Intern with a primary focus on MySQL. I gained hands-on experience in database management, including tasks such as query optimization, data structuring, and database maintenance.  


I also had the privilege of attending site meetings with the CEO, where I learned invaluable insights into project management, decision-making, and the overall business strategy. This direct exposure to leadership and operations helped me grow both technically and professionally.  


I contributed productively to various backend tasks, assisting with database-related queries, data integration, and backend development projects, which gave me a deeper understanding of backend architecture and data flow management.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Claims Separation System ‚Äì Full-Stack Development (.NET, React, SQL, MongoDB): Built a centralized claims platform, separating motor and health workflows to improve scalability and reduce complexity. Designed agent portals with search, dashboards, assignment algorithms, and lead pulling, reducing response latency by ~30%. ‚Ä¢ High-Load Reporting Optimization (ClickHouse, .NET): Migrated critical reporting pipelines from SQL Server to ClickHouse, lowering CPU utilization from 82% ‚Üí 29%, reducing database crashes by 90%, and significantly boosting uptime. ‚Ä¢ Renewal Callback Migration (Athena, APIs, Kafka, UnifyApps): Re-engineered the renewal callbacks workflow into a scalable event-driven pipeline, decoupling from legacy systems and improving system reliability and observability. ‚Ä¢ Master Management System (Django, Python): Administered and scaled the enterprise MDM system (single source of truth for products & partners), ensuring 99.9%+ data consistency across multiple environments.
positions.title: SDE 1
positions.description_html:
• Claims Separation System – Full-Stack Development (.NET, React, SQL, MongoDB):
Built a centralized claims platform, separating motor and health workflows to improve scalability and reduce complexity. Designed agent portals with search, dashboards, assignment algorithms, and lead pulling, reducing response latency by ~30%.

• High-Load Reporting Optimization (ClickHouse, .NET):
Migrated critical reporting pipelines from SQL Server to ClickHouse, lowering CPU utilization from 82% → 29%, reducing database crashes by 90%, and significantly boosting uptime.

• Renewal Callback Migration (Athena, APIs, Kafka, UnifyApps):
Re-engineered the renewal callbacks workflow into a scalable event-driven pipeline, decoupling from legacy systems and improving system reliability and observability.

• Master Management System (Django, Python):
Administered and scaled the enterprise MDM system (single source of truth for products & partners), ensuring 99.9%+ data consistency across multiple environments.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ TL Dashboard ‚Äì Reporting Pipeline (ClickHouse, MongoDB, React): Built a reporting dashboard with heavy ClickHouse queries refreshed every 45 minutes. Introduced MongoDB caching, improving load times by 60%. ‚Ä¢ Lead Rejection System ( .NET, AWS S3, Athena, MongoDB ): Designed a modular rejection system replacing legacy SQL workflows, cutting rule-change effort by 70%. Automated nightly job scheduling and validated accuracy via A/B testing, improving lead conversion quality. ‚Ä¢ Agent Tracking System (React, .NET, SQL Server, Google Maps API): Implemented real-time field agent tracking with live map integration, reducing coordination delays by 25%.

detailed_profile.name: Mayank Wadhwa
detailed_profile.about: I work in the Group Insurance servicing team (EB Servicing) at Policybazaar for Business where we focus on delivering technical support and backend development to streamline post-sales servicing for corporate clients. My role involves resolving real-time issues such as insurer coordination and system troubleshooting to ensure group health and other employee benefit policies are managed efficiently. Technologies I work with include * .NET for backend system development * SQL for database management and queries * Kafka for real-time event streaming * Node.js for building service integrations I am passionate about creating strong backend solutions that support seamless service delivery and enhance the experience for both clients and internal teams.

detailed_profile.name: Priyanshu Gupta
detailed_profile.about: I am a full stack developer at PolicyBazaar.com, specializing in backend engineering with a focus on scalable, data-intensive, and high-availability systems. I completed my engineering from Delhi Technological University (DTU) in 2025. For me, engineering is not just about writing code ‚Äî it‚Äôs about building systems that work reliably under pressure, scale with demand, and create real business value. I‚Äôm always eager to collaborate with teams that are pushing boundaries in backend engineering, system design, and scalable architecture.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Claims Separation System ‚Äì Full-Stack Development (.NET, React, SQL, MongoDB): Built a centralized claims platform, separating motor and health workflows to improve scalability and reduce complexity. Designed agent portals with search, dashboards, assignment algorithms, and lead pulling, reducing response latency by ~30%. ‚Ä¢ High-Load Reporting Optimization (ClickHouse, .NET): Migrated critical reporting pipelines from SQL Server to ClickHouse, lowering CPU utilization from 82% ‚Üí 29%, reducing database crashes by 90%, and significantly boosting uptime. ‚Ä¢ Renewal Callback Migration (Athena, APIs, Kafka, UnifyApps): Re-engineered the renewal callbacks workflow into a scalable event-driven pipeline, decoupling from legacy systems and improving system reliability and observability. ‚Ä¢ Master Management System (Django, Python): Administered and scaled the enterprise MDM system (single source of truth for products & partners), ensuring 99.9%+ data consistency across multiple environments.
positions.title: SDE 1
positions.description_html:
• Claims Separation System – Full-Stack Development (.NET, React, SQL, MongoDB):
Built a centralized claims platform, separating motor and health workflows to improve scalability and reduce complexity. Designed agent portals with search, dashboards, assignment algorithms, and lead pulling, reducing response latency by ~30%.

• High-Load Reporting Optimization (ClickHouse, .NET):
Migrated critical reporting pipelines from SQL Server to ClickHouse, lowering CPU utilization from 82% → 29%, reducing database crashes by 90%, and significantly boosting uptime.

• Renewal Callback Migration (Athena, APIs, Kafka, UnifyApps):
Re-engineered the renewal callbacks workflow into a scalable event-driven pipeline, decoupling from legacy systems and improving system reliability and observability.

• Master Management System (Django, Python):
Administered and scaled the enterprise MDM system (single source of truth for products & partners), ensuring 99.9%+ data consistency across multiple environments.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ TL Dashboard ‚Äì Reporting Pipeline (ClickHouse, MongoDB, React): Built a reporting dashboard with heavy ClickHouse queries refreshed every 45 minutes. Introduced MongoDB caching, improving load times by 60%. ‚Ä¢ Lead Rejection System ( .NET, AWS S3, Athena, MongoDB ): Designed a modular rejection system replacing legacy SQL workflows, cutting rule-change effort by 70%. Automated nightly job scheduling and validated accuracy via A/B testing, improving lead conversion quality. ‚Ä¢ Agent Tracking System (React, .NET, SQL Server, Google Maps API): Implemented real-time field agent tracking with live map integration, reducing coordination delays by 25%.

detailed_profile.name: Manohar Jha
detailed_profile.position: Sales Operations Manager @ Policybazaar | Driving Revenue Growth & Operational Excellence | Six Sigma Green Belt
detailed_profile.about: With over 8 years of experience in sales management and operations, I currently serve as a Sales Operations Manager at Policybazaar.com, leveraging Six Sigma expertise to streamline processes and enhance team efficiency. I am passionate about fostering collaboration and driving data-backed decisions to align with organizational goals. My mission is to empower teams by promoting open communication and innovation, ensuring sustainable growth and a customer-centric approach. At Policybazaar.com, I oversee sales operations, monitor key performance metrics, and contribute to strategic planning discussions. By utilizing analytical skills and collaborating across functional teams, I support revenue forecasting and the achievement of company objectives. My role is rooted in creating inspiring work environments, coaching teams, and ensuring adherence to performance goals, all while driving operational excellence.

experience.title: Channel Sales Manager
experience.description:
Developed and implemented strategic account plans that increased revenue by over 20% for key channel partners by identifying growth opportunities and providing tailored support, maximizing channel performance.

Trained and mentored new account managers and channel partners, sharing best practices and industry knowledge to improve sales performance and customer satisfaction, fostering a high-performing channel ecosystem.

Developed and delivered training programs on product knowledge, sales techniques, and customer support to empower channel partners to effectively represent the company and drive sales, increasing channel sales effectiveness.

Built and maintained mutually beneficial relationships with channel partners, fostering trust and collaboration to achieve shared business objectives and maximize revenue generation, creating a collaborative partnership environment.

Established a strong understanding of channel sales best practices and industry trends, leveraging insights to optimize channel strategies and drive growth, ensuring channel competitiveness.

Led the development and execution of channel sales campaigns that drove significant lead generation and qualified opportunities, resulting in increased sales and market share, expanding channel reach.

Utilized social media and digital marketing channels to engage with channel partners and promote sales opportunities, enhancing brand visibility and driving lead generation, improving channel marketing effectiveness.

Monitored customer trends and usage patterns to identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling within channel partner accounts, maximizing revenue potential, increasing channel profitability.

Managed key account budgets for channel partners, ensuring optimal return on investment and driving efficient resource allocation to achieve sales targets, maximizing channel ROI.

experience.title: Key Account Manager
experience.description:
Managed a portfolio of 50+ high-value enterprise accounts, exceeding revenue targets by 15% through strategic account management and proactive engagement.

Developed and executed strategic account plans, resulting in a 10% increase in customer satisfaction and improved account retention, strengthening long-term partnerships.

Cultivated strong relationships with key stakeholders (suppliers, carriers, customers), facilitating efficient collaboration and resolving issues proactively, ensuring high levels of satisfaction and account growth.

Monitored and controlled logistics budgets for key accounts, ensuring cost-effective operations and exceeding customer expectations, directly contributing to profitability goals.

Utilized lean principles to optimize logistics operations for key accounts, eliminating waste, reducing lead times by 10%, and enhancing customer satisfaction.

Analyzed customer feedback and identified areas for improvement in key account service delivery, leading to the implementation of new processes and initiatives that enhanced customer satisfaction by 12%.

Successfully negotiated contracts with key suppliers on behalf of key accounts, achieving significant cost savings of 8% and improved terms, directly impacting account profitability.

Managed key accounts across multiple channels (in-person, phone, email), providing personalized support and building strong relationships to drive revenue growth and customer loyalty.

Developed and executed a supply chain risk management plan, identifying and mitigating potential risks to the supply chain impacting key account deliveries, ensuring business continuity and minimizing disruptions.

Consistently surpassed performance targets, generating revenue growth of 20% over three consecutive quarters, demonstrating a strong track record of success.

Established and maintained strong relationships with C-level executives and decision-makers at key accounts, solidifying partnerships and influencing strategic decisions.

detailed_profile.about: ‚Ä¢ Dynamic and results-oriented Operations Excellence Leader with over 3 years of progressive experience driving process optimization, operational efficiency, and business transformation. Skilled in leading internal audits, developing and implementing scalable SOPs, and ensuring alignment of operational processes with overall business objectives. Recognized for improving first-time resolution rates, enhancing customer satisfaction, and delivering measurable results through data-driven decision-making and cross-functional collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Proficient in Power BI (data extraction and analysis), PowerPoint, Excel, Google Sheets, and Google Docs, with a strong ability to translate data into actionable insights and executive-level reports. Adept at stakeholder management, building strong relationships across departments, and supporting digital transformation initiatives that streamline operations and improve organizational performance ‚Ä¢ I am currently seeking new opportunities where I can leveragemy expertise in operational excellence, process improvement, and business analytics to contribute to organizational growth, drive innovation, and deliver sustainable results. Technical skills - * Data & Reporting Tools: Microsoft Excel (Advanced), Google Sheets, Power BI (Data extraction & reporting) * Documentation & Presentation: Google Docs, Microsoft PowerPoint, MS Office Suite * Business & Operations: SOP Documentation, Call Quality Assurance (QA) Evaluation, Email & Business * Communication Etiquette * Collaboration Platforms: Google Workspace, MicrosoftOffice 365 Core competencies - * Operational Strategy & Execution ‚Äì Driving efficiency, scalability, and alignment with business objectives. * Internal Audits & Risk Mitigation (IRDA Compliance) ‚Äì Conducting auditsto ensure adherence to regulatory * guidelines and minimizing operational risks. * SOP Design & Process Mapping ‚Äì Creating scalable Standard Operating Proceduresto streamline workflows and * standardize best practices. * Data-Driven Decision Making ‚Äì Leveraging analytics and reporting to inform strategic initiatives and optimize * performance outcomes. * End-to-End KYC & Verification Automation ‚Äì Implementing automation solutionsto strengthen compliance, reduced AHT tat. * Performance Coaching & Leadership ‚Äì Guiding and mentoring teamsto enhance productivity, accountability, and * BusinessIntelligence & Reporting Tools ‚Äì Skilled in Power BI (data extraction), Excel, and Master Management * Dashboards (e.g., city addition in health operations) Regards, Arunathakur387@gmail.com 8860181524

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Partner with Product, Technology, and Compliance teams to design and implement digital-first workflows, ensuring seamless integration with existing platforms and real-time system updates. ‚Ä¢ Lead and oversee internal audits, quality assurance assignments, and risk-mitigation initiatives, ensuring strict adherence to IRDA guidelines and organizational policies. ‚Ä¢ Drive SOP development, process mapping, and automation initiatives, ensuring scalability and continuous improvement in customer-facing operations. ‚Ä¢ Monitor agent productivity, quality scores, and compliance adherence, providing structured feedback, daily hurdle meetings, and targeted training programs. ‚Ä¢ Act as a strategic liaison between operations, technology, and business stakeholders to resolve bottlenecks, ensure data accuracy, and deliver high-quality customer experiences. Key Achievements: ‚Ä¢ Reduced endorsement turnaround time (TAT) by 7‚Äì10 days through creation of a structured endorsement matrix and real-time system field updates. ‚Ä¢ Designed and implemented a step-by-step Guided Workflow, significantly reducing agent errors and standardizing customer communications. ‚Ä¢ Conducted root-cause analyses for compliance failures, coordinated corrective action plans, and established preventative controls with business and compliance teams. ‚Ä¢ Increased first-contact resolution rates by enabling agents to execute system updates during live customer interactions.
positions.title: Lead ops excellence
positions.description_html:
• Partner with Product, Technology, and Compliance teams to design and implement digital-first workflows,
ensuring seamless integration with existing platforms and real-time system updates.
• Lead and oversee internal audits, quality assurance assignments, and risk-mitigation initiatives, ensuring strict
adherence to IRDA guidelines and organizational policies.
• Drive SOP development, process mapping, and automation initiatives, ensuring scalability and continuous
improvement in customer-facing operations.
• Monitor agent productivity, quality scores, and compliance adherence, providing structured feedback, daily
hurdle meetings, and targeted training programs.
• Act as a strategic liaison between operations, technology, and business stakeholders to resolve bottlenecks,
ensure data accuracy, and deliver high-quality customer experiences.

Key Achievements:
• Reduced endorsement turnaround time (TAT) by 7–10 days through creation of a structured endorsement
matrix and real-time system field updates.
• Designed and implemented a step-by-step Guided Workflow, significantly reducing agent errors and
standardizing customer communications.
• Conducted root-cause analyses for compliance failures, coordinated corrective action plans, and established
preventative controls with business and compliance teams.
• Increased first-contact resolution rates by enabling agents to execute system updates during live customer
interactions.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Handled inbound and outbound customer queries on health insurance policies, providing accurate policy details, guidance on KYC processes, and resolution of service requests. ‚Ä¢ Verified and validated submitted customer KYC and policy documents, ensuring completeness and compliance with IRDA guidelines. ‚Ä¢ Collaborated with backend and operations teams to resolve discrepancies and accelerate policy issuance. ‚Ä¢ Maintained detailed logs of customer interactions, escalating issues to supervisors where necessary for prompt resolution. ‚Ä¢ Supported new joiners by sharing process knowledge and mentoring them on customer communication and verification protocols. Key Contributions: ‚Ä¢ Introduced a Guided Workflow integrated with website APIs, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual errors, and ensuring uniformity in customer handling. ‚Ä¢ Reduced policy rejections by improving verification standards, strengthening documentation review, and refining customer communication strategies. ‚Ä¢ Contributed to overall customer satisfaction and operational reliability through consistent accuracy and proactive customer engagement.
positions.title: Quality Analyst
positions.description_html:
• Handled inbound and outbound customer queries on health insurance policies, providing accurate policy
details, guidance on KYC processes, and resolution of service requests.
• Verified and validated submitted customer KYC and policy documents, ensuring completeness and compliance
with IRDA guidelines.
• Collaborated with backend and operations teams to resolve discrepancies and accelerate policy issuance.
• Maintained detailed logs of customer interactions, escalating issues to supervisors where necessary for prompt
resolution.
• Supported new joiners by sharing process knowledge and mentoring them on customer communication and
verification protocols.

Key Contributions:
• Introduced a Guided Workflow integrated with website APIs, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual errors, and
ensuring uniformity in customer handling.
• Reduced policy rejections by improving verification standards, strengthening documentation review, and
refining customer communication strategies.
• Contributed to overall customer satisfaction and operational reliability through consistent accuracy and
proactive customer engagement.

recommendations: Parth Sarthi ‚Äú"Sometimes working on a cross company project, you find people who transition from becoming acquaintance to friends for life. Abhishek, is one such gem of a person.He is a great professional to work with. We worked together on a project in Future Generali where he was representing Policy Bazaar and had to provide an integral support for success of a novel product integration. He was always ready to put in the extra effort to make sure the project is completed without any issues and in lines of business timelines. To be honest, he was my go to tech guy in understanding Policy Bazaar- Future data sharing processes and tech architecture. This project was a novel 2 company, 2 product and 1 solution integration for Policy Bazaar marketplace platform and the result was a successful product launch which created benchmarks in industry. Thanks a lot, Abhishek! You are always a good catch for any organisation and as I keep saying, we will work together soon! Wish you success and glory! Cheers!"‚Äù

Abhinav Bansal ‚ÄúAbhishek is an exceptional Engineering manager with a rare combination of coding expertise, great problem-solving skills, and business intelligence. His focus is always to optimize the process whilst keeping bigger system architecture in mind. One of his strongest abilities is to communicate and come across fine-tuned details which greatly enhances the understanding experience. I highly recommend Abhishek for his ability to design large systems and to drive the product from inception to deployment. He proves to be a vital asset to any team.‚Äù

detailed_profile.about: With over 10 years of experience at Policybazaar.com, including more than 4 years as a Sales Team Lead, my focus has been on leading high-performing teams, achieving sales targets, and improving customer experiences. Our efforts center on optimizing sales processes, fostering skill development, and maintaining a customer-centric approach to drive sustainable business growth. By leveraging strategic planning and operational excellence, we deliver innovative solutions that enhance organizational performance. Collaborating on training initiatives and performance monitoring, we ensure team alignment with company objectives, reinforcing our commitment to measurable results and exceptional service.

matched.match_rationale: Manohar Jha is a Sales Operations Manager at Policybazaar, which closely matches Animesh Kumar's role in sales and operations leadership, including driving revenue growth and operational excellence.

detailed_profile.name: Manohar Jha
detailed_profile.position: Sales Operations Manager @ Policybazaar | Driving Revenue Growth & Operational Excellence | Six Sigma Green Belt
detailed_profile.about: With over 8 years of experience in sales management and operations, I currently serve as a Sales Operations Manager at Policybazaar.com, leveraging Six Sigma expertise to streamline processes and enhance team efficiency. I am passionate about fostering collaboration and driving data-backed decisions to align with organizational goals. My mission is to empower teams by promoting open communication and innovation, ensuring sustainable growth and a customer-centric approach. At Policybazaar.com, I oversee sales operations, monitor key performance metrics, and contribute to strategic planning discussions. By utilizing analytical skills and collaborating across functional teams, I support revenue forecasting and the achievement of company objectives. My role is rooted in creating inspiring work environments, coaching teams, and ensuring adherence to performance goals, all while driving operational excellence.

experience.title: Channel Sales Manager
experience.description:
Developed and implemented strategic account plans that increased revenue by over 20% for key channel partners by identifying growth opportunities and providing tailored support, maximizing channel performance.

Trained and mentored new account managers and channel partners, sharing best practices and industry knowledge to improve sales performance and customer satisfaction, fostering a high-performing channel ecosystem.

Developed and delivered training programs on product knowledge, sales techniques, and customer support to empower channel partners to effectively represent the company and drive sales, increasing channel sales effectiveness.

Built and maintained mutually beneficial relationships with channel partners, fostering trust and collaboration to achieve shared business objectives and maximize revenue generation, creating a collaborative partnership environment.

Established a strong understanding of channel sales best practices and industry trends, leveraging insights to optimize channel strategies and drive growth, ensuring channel competitiveness.

Led the development and execution of channel sales campaigns that drove significant lead generation and qualified opportunities, resulting in increased sales and market share, expanding channel reach.

Utilized social media and digital marketing channels to engage with channel partners and promote sales opportunities, enhancing brand visibility and driving lead generation, improving channel marketing effectiveness.

Monitored customer trends and usage patterns to identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling within channel partner accounts, maximizing revenue potential, increasing channel profitability.

Managed key account budgets for channel partners, ensuring optimal return on investment and driving efficient resource allocation to achieve sales targets, maximizing channel ROI.

experience.title: Key Account Manager
experience.description:
Managed a portfolio of 50+ high-value enterprise accounts, exceeding revenue targets by 15% through strategic account management and proactive engagement.

Developed and executed strategic account plans, resulting in a 10% increase in customer satisfaction and improved account retention, strengthening long-term partnerships.

Cultivated strong relationships with key stakeholders (suppliers, carriers, customers), facilitating efficient collaboration and resolving issues proactively, ensuring high levels of satisfaction and account growth.

Monitored and controlled logistics budgets for key accounts, ensuring cost-effective operations and exceeding customer expectations, directly contributing to profitability goals.

Utilized lean principles to optimize logistics operations for key accounts, eliminating waste, reducing lead times by 10%, and enhancing customer satisfaction.

Analyzed customer feedback and identified areas for improvement in key account service delivery, leading to the implementation of new processes and initiatives that enhanced customer satisfaction by 12%.

Successfully negotiated contracts with key suppliers on behalf of key accounts, achieving significant cost savings of 8% and improved terms, directly impacting account profitability.

Managed key accounts across multiple channels (in-person, phone, email), providing personalized support and building strong relationships to drive revenue growth and customer loyalty.

Developed and executed a supply chain risk management plan, identifying and mitigating potential risks to the supply chain impacting key account deliveries, ensuring business continuity and minimizing disruptions.

Consistently surpassed performance targets, generating revenue growth of 20% over three consecutive quarters, demonstrating a strong track record of success.

Established and maintained strong relationships with C-level executives and decision-makers at key accounts, solidifying partnerships and influencing strategic decisions.

positions.title: Branch Manager
positions.description_html:
Company: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd. (Universal Sompo) - a joint venture (JV) between Allahabad Bank, Sompo Japan Insurance Inc., Indian Overseas Bank, Karnataka Bank and Dabur Investments - Universal Sompo is a uniquely symbolic example of fruitful Public-Private sector partnerships.

Profit Centre Manager whereby key functions are developing channels like Brokers, Agents, and Motor Dealers to increase the penetration and thus increase the business volume in addition to our promoter banks Bancassurance business and new co-operative bank tie-ups. Ensure best services in terms of deliverables like claims, policy delivery managing payouts and providing knowledge in terms of insurance.

• Experience in establishing the market for the organization.
• In depth knowledge of all the products & services.
• Experience in managing business operations in diversified products.
• Experience in managing all facets of business from marketing, general administration, human resources and operations.
• Received management accolades as regards to performance and posed confidence in me by allowing me to continue in the branch of USGI for six & half years and eventually made me Head of the Branch in April 2015 at Karnal.
• Generate the growth every year in Bancassurance and generate profit , selling the co branded products/cross sell products in Banks
• Improve the agency business, and recruit new potential agents with company.
• Handling our national tie-up channel partner for motor business, Honda dealership & Nissan dealership.

detailed_profile.name: Pooja Naagar
detailed_profile.about: Greetings! I am an enthusiastic and results-driven professional with a diverse background in the BPO industry. In 2019, I was engaged in the dynamic world of collections, serving as an integral part of the SBI Card and Konexion back office teams. During my tenure, I honed my skills in effective communication, problem-solving, and relationship management. In 2020, I took on new challenges, joining the esteemed Citibank as part of their card collection team. Here, I had the opportunity to collaborate with a highly talented and motivated group, contributing to the success of the team while delivering exceptional customer experiences. Expanding my horizons further, in 2022, I embarked on a fulfilling journey with Indiabulls Dhani, where I thrived in a customer support role. This experience enabled me to deepen my understanding of customer needs and enhance my ability to provide top-notch assistance and solutions. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated a keen aptitude for adapting to different industry environments and leveraging my industry-specific skills. My achievements in meeting and exceeding targets, resolving complex issues, and fostering positive relationships with clients have been pivotal to my growth. I am passionate about continuous learning and applying my skills to drive value for both customers and the organizations I serve. If you are seeking a dedicated professional who brings a proven track record of success and a passion for excellence, let's connect!

I‚Äôve handled cross-platform communication (calls, emails, WhatsApp), addressed both domestic and international queries, and always focused on delivering clear, helpful, and timely service. My key strengths lie in empathy, adaptability, and a never-give-up mindset. I‚Äôm passionate about customer experience and enjoy helping people navigate complex systems‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs travel or insurance. In addition to my work, I‚Äôve completed a professional course in Aviation, Hospitality & Customer Service from Frankfinn and have knowledge of Amadeus software. As I continue my MBA journey, I‚Äôm keen to grow into roles that blend my client service expertise with strategic thinking‚Äîsuch as customer success, relationship management, or insurance advisory. üì© Let‚Äôs connect if you‚Äôre looking for a passionate, energetic team player who‚Äôs ready to learn, contribute, and grow! I am passionate about fostering collaboration and driving data-backed decisions to align with organizational goals. My mission is to empower teams by promoting open communication and innovation, ensuring sustainable growth and a customer-centric approach. At Policybazaar.com, I oversee sales operations, monitor key performance metrics, and contribute to strategic planning discussions. By utilizing analytical skills and collaborating across functional teams, I support revenue forecasting and the achievement of company objectives. My role is rooted in creating inspiring work environments, coaching teams, and ensuring adherence to performance goals, all while driving operational excellence.

Built and maintained mutually beneficial relationships with channel partners, fostering trust and collaboration to achieve shared business objectives and maximize revenue generation, creating a collaborative partnership environment.

Established a strong understanding of channel sales best practices and industry trends, leveraging insights to optimize channel strategies and drive growth, ensuring channel competitiveness.

Led the development and execution of channel sales campaigns that drove significant lead generation and qualified opportunities, resulting in increased sales and market share, expanding channel reach.

Utilized social media and digital marketing channels to engage with channel partners and promote sales opportunities, enhancing brand visibility and driving lead generation, improving channel marketing effectiveness.

Monitored customer trends and usage patterns to identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling within channel partner accounts, maximizing revenue potential, increasing channel profitability.

Managed key account budgets for channel partners, ensuring optimal return on investment and driving efficient resource allocation to achieve sales targets, maximizing channel ROI.

experience.title: Key Account Manager
experience.description:
Managed a portfolio of 50+ high-value enterprise accounts, exceeding revenue targets by 15% through strategic account management and proactive engagement.

Developed and executed strategic account plans, resulting in a 10% increase in customer satisfaction and improved account retention, strengthening long-term partnerships.

Cultivated strong relationships with key stakeholders (suppliers, carriers, customers), facilitating efficient collaboration and resolving issues proactively, ensuring high levels of satisfaction and account growth.

Monitored and controlled logistics budgets for key accounts, ensuring cost-effective operations and exceeding customer expectations, directly contributing to profitability goals.

Utilized lean principles to optimize logistics operations for key accounts, eliminating waste, reducing lead times by 10%, and enhancing customer satisfaction.

Analyzed customer feedback and identified areas for improvement in key account service delivery, leading to the implementation of new processes and initiatives that enhanced customer satisfaction by 12%.

Successfully negotiated contracts with key suppliers on behalf of key accounts, achieving significant cost savings of 8% and improved terms, directly impacting account profitability.

Managed key accounts across multiple channels (in-person, phone, email), providing personalized support and building strong relationships to drive revenue growth and customer loyalty.

Developed and executed a supply chain risk management plan, identifying and mitigating potential risks to the supply chain impacting key account deliveries, ensuring business continuity and minimizing disruptions.

Consistently surpassed performance targets, generating revenue growth of 20% over three consecutive quarters, demonstrating a strong track record of success.

Established and maintained strong relationships with C-level executives and decision-makers at key accounts, solidifying partnerships and influencing strategic decisions.

detailed_profile.about: With three years of HR experience covering recruitment, onboarding, engagement, and operations, I now serve as a Human Resources Business Partner. In this role, I focus on aligning HR initiatives with business activities, leading initiatives like business unit reports and employee branding, retention and attrition control strategies. My key tasks include managing employee grievances, retention efforts, attrition and exit management, coordinating FNF settlements for payroll, developing performance improvement plans, arranging feedback sessions, ensuring compliance, and conducting employee-centric trainings and inductions to meet business needs.

My never-give-up attitude, combined with a passion for mentoring and leading teams, has enabled me to create high-performing sales environments. I thrive on challenges and am always eager to leverage my skills to drive business growth and achieve exceptional results.

	‚Ä¢	Maintaining candidate databases and tracking hiring progress using internal tools

	‚Ä¢	Supporting the HR team in achieving weekly and monthly hiring targets


Gaining hands-on experience in high-volume recruitment and developing a strong understanding of talent acquisition processes.
experience.description_html:
Currently working as an Executive – Human Resource, primarily handling sourcing and screening of candidates for various roles. Responsible for end-to-end recruitment support including:
• Sourcing potential candidates through job portals like Naukri and LinkedIn
• Screening resumes based on job requirements and shortlisting suitable profiles
• Coordinating telephonic interviews and follow-ups with shortlisted candidates
• Maintaining candidate databases and tracking hiring progress using internal tools
• Supporting the HR team in achieving weekly and monthly hiring targets

Gaining hands-on experience in high-volume recruitment and developing a strong understanding of talent acquisition processes.

positions.subtitle: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.
positions.description: Company: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd. (Universal Sompo) - a joint venture (JV) between Allahabad Bank, Sompo Japan Insurance Inc., Indian Overseas Bank, Karnataka Bank and Dabur Investments - Universal Sompo is a uniquely symbolic example of fruitful Public-Private sector partnerships. Profit Centre Manager whereby key functions are developing channels like Brokers, Agents, and Motor Dealers to increase the penetration and thus increase the business volume in addition to our promoter banks Bancassurance business and new co-operative bank tie-ups. Ensure best services in terms of deliverables like claims, policy delivery managing payouts and providing knowledge in terms of insurance. ‚Ä¢ Experience in establishing the market for the organization. ‚Ä¢ In depth knowledge of all the products & services. ‚Ä¢ Experience in managing business operations in diversified products. ‚Ä¢ Experience in managing all facets of business from marketing, general administration, human resources and operations. ‚Ä¢ Received management accolades as regards to performance and posed confidence in me by allowing me to continue in the branch of USGI for six & half years and eventually made me Head of the Branch in April 2015 at Karnal. ‚Ä¢ Generate the growth every year in Bancassurance and generate profit , selling the co branded products/cross sell products in Banks ‚Ä¢ Improve the agency business, and recruit new potential agents with company. ‚Ä¢ Handling our national tie-up channel partner for motor business, Honda dealership & Nissan dealership.
positions.title: Branch Manager
positions.description_html:
Company: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd. (Universal Sompo) - a joint venture (JV) between Allahabad Bank, Sompo Japan Insurance Inc., Indian Overseas Bank, Karnataka Bank and Dabur Investments - Universal Sompo is a uniquely symbolic example of fruitful Public-Private sector partnerships.

Profit Centre Manager whereby key functions are developing channels like Brokers, Agents, and Motor Dealers to increase the penetration and thus increase the business volume in addition to our promoter banks Bancassurance business and new co-operative bank tie-ups. Ensure best services in terms of deliverables like claims, policy delivery managing payouts and providing knowledge in terms of insurance.

• Experience in establishing the market for the organization.
• In depth knowledge of all the products & services.
• Experience in managing business operations in diversified products.
• Experience in managing all facets of business from marketing, general administration, human resources and operations.
• Received management accolades as regards to performance and posed confidence in me by allowing me to continue in the branch of USGI for six & half years and eventually made me Head of the Branch in April 2015 at Karnal.
• Generate the growth every year in Bancassurance and generate profit , selling the co branded products/cross sell products in Banks
• Improve the agency business, and recruit new potential agents with company.
• Handling our national tie-up channel partner for motor business, Honda dealership & Nissan dealership.

positions.subtitle: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.

detailed_profile.about: ‚Ä¢ Dynamic and results-oriented Operations Excellence Leader with over 3 years of progressive experience driving process optimization, operational efficiency, and business transformation. Skilled in leading internal audits, developing and implementing scalable SOPs, and ensuring alignment of operational processes with overall business objectives. Recognized for improving first-time resolution rates, enhancing customer satisfaction, and delivering measurable results through data-driven decision-making and cross-functional collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Proficient in Power BI (data extraction and analysis), PowerPoint, Excel, Google Sheets, and Google Docs, with a strong ability to translate data into actionable insights and executive-level reports. Adept at stakeholder management, building strong relationships across departments, and supporting digital transformation initiatives that streamline operations and improve organizational performance ‚Ä¢ I am currently seeking new opportunities where I can leveragemy expertise in operational excellence, process improvement, and business analytics to contribute to organizational growth, drive innovation, and deliver sustainable results. Technical skills - * Data & Reporting Tools: Microsoft Excel (Advanced), Google Sheets, Power BI (Data extraction & reporting) * Documentation & Presentation: Google Docs, Microsoft PowerPoint, MS Office Suite * Business & Operations: SOP Documentation, Call Quality Assurance (QA) Evaluation, Email & Business * Communication Etiquette * Collaboration Platforms: Google Workspace, MicrosoftOffice 365 Core competencies - * Operational Strategy & Execution ‚Äì Driving efficiency, scalability, and alignment with business objectives. * Internal Audits & Risk Mitigation (IRDA Compliance) ‚Äì Conducting auditsto ensure adherence to regulatory * guidelines and minimizing operational risks. * SOP Design & Process Mapping ‚Äì Creating scalable Standard Operating Proceduresto streamline workflows and * standardize best practices. * Data-Driven Decision Making ‚Äì Leveraging analytics and reporting to inform strategic initiatives and optimize * performance outcomes. * End-to-End KYC & Verification Automation ‚Äì Implementing automation solutionsto strengthen compliance, reduced AHT tat. * Performance Coaching & Leadership ‚Äì Guiding and mentoring teamsto enhance productivity, accountability, and * BusinessIntelligence & Reporting Tools ‚Äì Skilled in Power BI (data extraction), Excel, and Master Management * Dashboards (e.g., city addition in health operations) Regards, Arunathakur387@gmail.com 8860181524

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Partner with Product, Technology, and Compliance teams to design and implement digital-first workflows, ensuring seamless integration with existing platforms and real-time system updates. ‚Ä¢ Lead and oversee internal audits, quality assurance assignments, and risk-mitigation initiatives, ensuring strict adherence to IRDA guidelines and organizational policies. ‚Ä¢ Drive SOP development, process mapping, and automation initiatives, ensuring scalability and continuous improvement in customer-facing operations. ‚Ä¢ Monitor agent productivity, quality scores, and compliance adherence, providing structured feedback, daily hurdle meetings, and targeted training programs. ‚Ä¢ Act as a strategic liaison between operations, technology, and business stakeholders to resolve bottlenecks, ensure data accuracy, and deliver high-quality customer experiences. Key Achievements: ‚Ä¢ Reduced endorsement turnaround time (TAT) by 7‚Äì10 days through creation of a structured endorsement matrix and real-time system field updates. ‚Ä¢ Designed and implemented a step-by-step Guided Workflow, significantly reducing agent errors and standardizing customer communications. ‚Ä¢ Conducted root-cause analyses for compliance failures, coordinated corrective action plans, and established preventative controls with business and compliance teams. ‚Ä¢ Increased first-contact resolution rates by enabling agents to execute system updates during live customer interactions.
positions.title: Lead ops excellence
positions.description_html:
• Partner with Product, Technology, and Compliance teams to design and implement digital-first workflows,
ensuring seamless integration with existing platforms and real-time system updates.
• Lead and oversee internal audits, quality assurance assignments, and risk-mitigation initiatives, ensuring strict
adherence to IRDA guidelines and organizational policies.
• Drive SOP development, process mapping, and automation initiatives, ensuring scalability and continuous
improvement in customer-facing operations.
• Monitor agent productivity, quality scores, and compliance adherence, providing structured feedback, daily
hurdle meetings, and targeted training programs.
• Act as a strategic liaison between operations, technology, and business stakeholders to resolve bottlenecks,
ensure data accuracy, and deliver high-quality customer experiences.

Key Achievements:
• Reduced endorsement turnaround time (TAT) by 7–10 days through creation of a structured endorsement
matrix and real-time system field updates.
• Designed and implemented a step-by-step Guided Workflow, significantly reducing agent errors and
standardizing customer communications.
• Conducted root-cause analyses for compliance failures, coordinated corrective action plans, and established
preventative controls with business and compliance teams.
• Increased first-contact resolution rates by enabling agents to execute system updates during live customer
interactions.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Handled inbound and outbound customer queries on health insurance policies, providing accurate policy details, guidance on KYC processes, and resolution of service requests. ‚Ä¢ Verified and validated submitted customer KYC and policy documents, ensuring completeness and compliance with IRDA guidelines. ‚Ä¢ Collaborated with backend and operations teams to resolve discrepancies and accelerate policy issuance. ‚Ä¢ Maintained detailed logs of customer interactions, escalating issues to supervisors where necessary for prompt resolution. ‚Ä¢ Supported new joiners by sharing process knowledge and mentoring them on customer communication and verification protocols. Key Contributions: ‚Ä¢ Introduced a Guided Workflow integrated with website APIs, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual errors, and ensuring uniformity in customer handling. ‚Ä¢ Reduced policy rejections by improving verification standards, strengthening documentation review, and refining customer communication strategies. ‚Ä¢ Contributed to overall customer satisfaction and operational reliability through consistent accuracy and proactive customer engagement.
positions.title: Quality Analyst
positions.description_html:
• Handled inbound and outbound customer queries on health insurance policies, providing accurate policy
details, guidance on KYC processes, and resolution of service requests.
• Verified and validated submitted customer KYC and policy documents, ensuring completeness and compliance
with IRDA guidelines.
• Collaborated with backend and operations teams to resolve discrepancies and accelerate policy issuance.
• Maintained detailed logs of customer interactions, escalating issues to supervisors where necessary for prompt
resolution.
• Supported new joiners by sharing process knowledge and mentoring them on customer communication and
verification protocols.

Key Contributions:
• Introduced a Guided Workflow integrated with website APIs, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual errors, and
ensuring uniformity in customer handling.
• Reduced policy rejections by improving verification standards, strengthening documentation review, and
refining customer communication strategies.
• Contributed to overall customer satisfaction and operational reliability through consistent accuracy and
proactive customer engagement.

matched.match_rationale: Shourya Singh is driving sales success at PolicyBazaar and is a team leader, which closely aligns with Salman Ahmed's role in sales management and team building.

detailed_profile.name: Shourya Singh
detailed_profile.position: Driving Sales Success at PolicyBazaar | Team Leader | Expert in E-commerce, Loans, & Insurance
detailed_profile.about: With over 5 and a half years of experience in sales across various domains including e-commerce products, personal loans, and insurance, I have honed a diverse skill set and a results-driven approach. My journey has been marked by a relentless drive to succeed and an unwavering commitment to excellence. Key Highlights: - **Sales Expertise:** Proven track record in driving sales and achieving significant milestones in e-commerce products, personal loans, and insurance. - **Leadership:** Proactive leadership with extensive experience in team management, coaching, and monitoring. Recognized with multiple Best Team Leader (TL) awards in RNR. - **Problem Solving & Data Analysis:** Strong problem-solving skills with a keen eye for data analysis and a solid understanding of MS Excel. - **Business Development:** Played a pivotal role in business development, implementing various strategies to boost sales and enhance performance. - **Achievements:** Consistently achieved and surpassed sales targets, resulting in three promotions within five years. - **Continuous Improvement:** Committed to continuous improvement, I have introduced several initiatives to enhance sales processes and outcomes. My never-give-up attitude, combined with a passion for mentoring and leading teams, has enabled me to create high-performing sales environments. I thrive on challenges and am always eager to leverage my skills to drive business growth and achieve exceptional results.

matched.match_rationale: Manohar Jha is a Sales Operations Manager at Policybazaar, which is closely related to the role of Assistant Manager in Sales. Both positions involve driving revenue growth and operational excellence.

detailed_profile.name: Manohar Jha
detailed_profile.position: Sales Operations Manager @ Policybazaar | Driving Revenue Growth & Operational Excellence | Six Sigma Green Belt
detailed_profile.about: With over 8 years of experience in sales management and operations, I currently serve as a Sales Operations Manager at Policybazaar.com, leveraging Six Sigma expertise to streamline processes and enhance team efficiency. I am passionate about fostering collaboration and driving data-backed decisions to align with organizational goals. My mission is to empower teams by promoting open communication and innovation, ensuring sustainable growth and a customer-centric approach. At Policybazaar.com, I oversee sales operations, monitor key performance metrics, and contribute to strategic planning discussions. By utilizing analytical skills and collaborating across functional teams, I support revenue forecasting and the achievement of company objectives. My role is rooted in creating inspiring work environments, coaching teams, and ensuring adherence to performance goals, all while driving operational excellence.

experience.title: Channel Sales Manager
experience.description:
Developed and implemented strategic account plans that increased revenue by over 20% for key channel partners by identifying growth opportunities and providing tailored support, maximizing channel performance.

Trained and mentored new account managers and channel partners, sharing best practices and industry knowledge to improve sales performance and customer satisfaction, fostering a high-performing channel ecosystem.

Developed and delivered training programs on product knowledge, sales techniques, and customer support to empower channel partners to effectively represent the company and drive sales, increasing channel sales effectiveness.

Built and maintained mutually beneficial relationships with channel partners, fostering trust and collaboration to achieve shared business objectives and maximize revenue generation, creating a collaborative partnership environment.

Established a strong understanding of channel sales best practices and industry trends, leveraging insights to optimize channel strategies and drive growth, ensuring channel competitiveness.

Led the development and execution of channel sales campaigns that drove significant lead generation and qualified opportunities, resulting in increased sales and market share, expanding channel reach.

Utilized social media and digital marketing channels to engage with channel partners and promote sales opportunities, enhancing brand visibility and driving lead generation, improving channel marketing effectiveness.

Monitored customer trends and usage patterns to identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling within channel partner accounts, maximizing revenue potential, increasing channel profitability.

Managed key account budgets for channel partners, ensuring optimal return on investment and driving efficient resource allocation to achieve sales targets, maximizing channel ROI.

experience.company: ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited

experience.title: Key Account Manager
experience.description:
Managed a portfolio of 50+ high-value enterprise accounts, exceeding revenue targets by 15% through strategic account management and proactive engagement.

Developed and executed strategic account plans, resulting in a 10% increase in customer satisfaction and improved account retention, strengthening long-term partnerships.

Cultivated strong relationships with key stakeholders (suppliers, carriers, customers), facilitating efficient collaboration and resolving issues proactively, ensuring high levels of satisfaction and account growth.

Monitored and controlled logistics budgets for key accounts, ensuring cost-effective operations and exceeding customer expectations, directly contributing to profitability goals.

Utilized lean principles to optimize logistics operations for key accounts, eliminating waste, reducing lead times by 10%, and enhancing customer satisfaction.

Analyzed customer feedback and identified areas for improvement in key account service delivery, leading to the implementation of new processes and initiatives that enhanced customer satisfaction by 12%.

Successfully negotiated contracts with key suppliers on behalf of key accounts, achieving significant cost savings of 8% and improved terms, directly impacting account profitability.

Managed key accounts across multiple channels (in-person, phone, email), providing personalized support and building strong relationships to drive revenue growth and customer loyalty.

Developed and executed a supply chain risk management plan, identifying and mitigating potential risks to the supply chain impacting key account deliveries, ensuring business continuity and minimizing disruptions.

Consistently surpassed performance targets, generating revenue growth of 20% over three consecutive quarters, demonstrating a strong track record of success.

Established and maintained strong relationships with C-level executives and decision-makers at key accounts, solidifying partnerships and influencing strategic decisions.

detailed_profile.name: Sujit Mor
detailed_profile.position: Data Analytics Team Leader at Policybazaar.com
detailed_profile.about: As a dedicated and innovative Data Analytics Team Leader at Policy Bazaar, I bring a wealth of experience in automation, data analysis, and strategic planning. My current focus is on automating processes to significantly enhance efficiency and accuracy for our sales and ACM teams. In my role, I have spearheaded the automation of policy dashboards using Python, pandas, and xlwings, resulting in a remarkable saving of 20 hours per week of manual analysis. This transformation has not only improved the accuracy of our data insights but also allowed our team to focus on more strategic tasks. Additionally, I have streamlined the creation of PowerPoint presentations for the sales team by leveraging Python, pandas, and python-pptx. This automation has reduced the presentation creation time from 15 hours to just 3 hours, enabling our team to deliver high-quality presentations more swiftly and effectively. My career journey also includes experience as a Production and Quality engineer in the Mechanical industry and as a Procurement Professional at Dr. Lal Path Labs. These roles have provided me with a solid foundation in operational efficiency and process optimization, skills that I now apply to the world of data analytics. With a passion for leveraging technology to drive business success, I am committed to continuous improvement and innovation. I am excited to connect with like-minded professionals and explore opportunities to collaborate on impactful projects.

experience.title: Team Leader Data Analytics
experience.description:
As a passionate Data Analytics Team Leader at Policy Bazaar, I specialize in transforming manual processes into efficient, automated systems that save time and enhance accuracy. Currently, my work focuses on automating dashboards and presentations, significantly improving our team's productivity.


In my role, I've developed and implemented Python-based automation for policy dashboards using pandas and xlwings. This initiative has successfully saved 20 hours per week of manual analysis, allowing our team to redirect efforts towards strategic, high-impact tasks.


Additionally, I've revolutionized our sales team's presentation process by automating PowerPoint creation with Python, pandas, and python-pptx. This automation has cut down the creation time from 15 hours to just 3 hours per presentation, ensuring quick and reliable delivery of high-quality presentations.

As a .NET Developer at Policybazaar, I specialize in building robust, scalable, and high-performance applications using C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core, Web APIs, and SQL. Passionate about writing clean and efficient code.

Beyond coding, I have a strong background in leadership, having served as Vice President and Deputy Secretary, Discipline Head at ICFAI University, where I developed my ability to lead teams, organize events, and drive impactful initiatives.

I hold multiple certifications that validate my knowledge in many fields like software development and backend technologies. My commitment to continuous learning ensures that I stay updated with industry trends and best practices.

experience.title: Vice President - Icfai Tech Council
experience.description:
üåü Vice President | Discipline Head | Deputy Secretary | Student Leadership | Sports Enthusiast


I have had the privilege of serving in multiple leadership roles during my time at ICFAI University, where I gained invaluable experience in team management, event organization, and strategic decision-making.


üîπ Vice President (Student Council): 

As the Vice President of the Icfai Tech, I worked closely with university leadership to ensure the smooth functioning of student affairs, while fostering a positive and productive environment for the student body. I led various initiatives aimed at improving student engagement, academic resources, and extracurricular activities.


üîπ Discipline Committee Member to Discipline Head: 

My journey began as a Discipline Committee Member, where I was involved in enforcing university rules and regulations. My performance led to my promotion to Discipline Head(Head of the Committee), where I was responsible for overseeing discipline-related activities and ensuring the welfare of students.


üîπ Deputy Secretary (Sports Club):

Currently, I serve as the Deputy Secretary for the University‚Äôs Sports Club of 5 Schools, contributing to the management and promotion of sports events, and helping build a vibrant sports culture on campus.


These roles have allowed me to develop strong leadership, organizational, and communication skills while giving me the opportunity to make a positive impact on the campus community.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description:
During my summer internship, I had the opportunity to work as both a Database Management Intern and a Backend Intern with a primary focus on MySQL. I gained hands-on experience in database management, including tasks such as query optimization, data structuring, and database maintenance.  


I also had the privilege of attending site meetings with the CEO, where I learned invaluable insights into project management, decision-making, and the overall business strategy. This direct exposure to leadership and operations helped me grow both technically and professionally.  


I contributed productively to various backend tasks, assisting with database-related queries, data integration, and backend development projects, which gave me a deeper understanding of backend architecture and data flow management.
experience.description_html:
During my summer internship, I had the opportunity to work as both a Database Management Intern and a Backend Intern with a primary focus on MySQL. I gained hands-on experience in database management, including tasks such as query optimization, data structuring, and database maintenance.

I also had the privilege of attending site meetings with the CEO, where I learned invaluable insights into project management, decision-making, and the overall business strategy. This direct exposure to leadership and operations helped me grow both technically and professionally.

detailed_profile.name: Pooja Naagar
detailed_profile.about: Greetings! I am an enthusiastic and results-driven professional with a diverse background in the BPO industry. In 2019, I was engaged in the dynamic world of collections, serving as an integral part of the SBI Card and Konexion back office teams. During my tenure, I honed my skills in effective communication, problem-solving, and relationship management. In 2020, I took on new challenges, joining the esteemed Citibank as part of their card collection team. Here, I had the opportunity to collaborate with a highly talented and motivated group, contributing to the success of the team while delivering exceptional customer experiences. Expanding my horizons further, in 2022, I embarked on a fulfilling journey with Indiabulls Dhani, where I thrived in a customer support role. This experience enabled me to deepen my understanding of customer needs and enhance my ability to provide top-notch assistance and solutions. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated a keen aptitude for adapting to different industry environments and leveraging my industry-specific skills. My achievements in meeting and exceeding targets, resolving complex issues, and fostering positive relationships with clients have been pivotal to my growth. I am passionate about continuous learning and applying my skills to drive value for both customers and the organizations I serve. If you are seeking a dedicated professional who brings a proven track record of success and a passion for excellence, let's connect!

detailed_profile.name: Shourya Singh
detailed_profile.position: Driving Sales Success at PolicyBazaar | Team Leader | Expert in E-commerce, Loans, & Insurance
detailed_profile.about: With over 5 and a half years of experience in sales across various domains including e-commerce products, personal loans, and insurance, I have honed a diverse skill set and a results-driven approach. My journey has been marked by a relentless drive to succeed and an unwavering commitment to excellence. Key Highlights: - **Sales Expertise:** Proven track record in driving sales and achieving significant milestones in e-commerce products, personal loans, and insurance. - **Leadership:** Proactive leadership with extensive experience in team management, coaching, and monitoring. Recognized with multiple Best Team Leader (TL) awards in RNR. - **Problem Solving & Data Analysis:** Strong problem-solving skills with a keen eye for data analysis and a solid understanding of MS Excel. - **Business Development:** Played a pivotal role in business development, implementing various strategies to boost sales and enhance performance. - **Achievements:** Consistently achieved and surpassed sales targets, resulting in three promotions within five years. - **Continuous Improvement:** Committed to continuous improvement, I have introduced several initiatives to enhance sales processes and outcomes. My never-give-up attitude, combined with a passion for mentoring and leading teams, has enabled me to create high-performing sales environments. I thrive on challenges and am always eager to leverage my skills to drive business growth and achieve exceptional results.
