positions.title: Branch Manager
positions.description_html:
Company: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd. (Universal Sompo) - a joint venture (JV) between Allahabad Bank, Sompo Japan Insurance Inc., Indian Overseas Bank, Karnataka Bank and Dabur Investments - Universal Sompo is a uniquely symbolic example of fruitful Public-Private sector partnerships.

Profit Centre Manager whereby key functions are developing channels like Brokers, Agents, and Motor Dealers to increase the penetration and thus increase the business volume in addition to our promoter banks Bancassurance business and new co-operative bank tie-ups. Ensure best services in terms of deliverables like claims, policy delivery managing payouts and providing knowledge in terms of insurance.

• Experience in establishing the market for the organization.
• In depth knowledge of all the products & services.
• Experience in managing business operations in diversified products.
• Experience in managing all facets of business from marketing, general administration, human resources and operations.
• Received management accolades as regards to performance and posed confidence in me by allowing me to continue in the branch of USGI for six & half years and eventually made me Head of the Branch in April 2015 at Karnal.
• Generate the growth every year in Bancassurance and generate profit , selling the co branded products/cross sell products in Banks
• Improve the agency business, and recruit new potential agents with company.
• Handling our national tie-up channel partner for motor business, Honda dealership & Nissan dealership.

(Universal Sompo) - a joint venture (JV) between Allahabad Bank, Sompo Japan Insurance Inc., Indian Overseas Bank, Karnataka Bank and Dabur Investments - Universal Sompo is a uniquely symbolic example of fruitful Public-Private sector partnerships. Ensure best services in terms of deliverables like claims, policy delivery managing payouts and providing knowledge in terms of insurance. ‚Ä¢ Experience in establishing the market for the organization. ‚Ä¢ In depth knowledge of all the products & services. ‚Ä¢ Experience in managing business operations in diversified products. ‚Ä¢ Experience in managing all facets of business from marketing, general administration, human resources and operations. ‚Ä¢ Received management accolades as regards to performance and posed confidence in me by allowing me to continue in the branch of USGI for six & half years and eventually made me Head of the Branch in April 2015 at Karnal. ‚Ä¢ Generate the growth every year in Bancassurance and generate profit , selling the co branded products/cross sell products in Banks ‚Ä¢ Improve the agency business, and recruit new potential agents with company. ‚Ä¢ Handling our national tie-up channel partner for motor business, Honda dealership & Nissan dealership.
positions.title: Branch Manager
positions.description_html:
Company: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd. (Universal Sompo) - a joint venture (JV) between Allahabad Bank, Sompo Japan Insurance Inc., Indian Overseas Bank, Karnataka Bank and Dabur Investments - Universal Sompo is a uniquely symbolic example of fruitful Public-Private sector partnerships.

Profit Centre Manager whereby key functions are developing channels like Brokers, Agents, and Motor Dealers to increase the penetration and thus increase the business volume in addition to our promoter banks Bancassurance business and new co-operative bank tie-ups. Ensure best services in terms of deliverables like claims, policy delivery managing payouts and providing knowledge in terms of insurance.

• Experience in establishing the market for the organization.
• In depth knowledge of all the products & services.
• Experience in managing business operations in diversified products.
• Experience in managing all facets of business from marketing, general administration, human resources and operations.
• Received management accolades as regards to performance and posed confidence in me by allowing me to continue in the branch of USGI for six & half years and eventually made me Head of the Branch in April 2015 at Karnal.
• Generate the growth every year in Bancassurance and generate profit , selling the co branded products/cross sell products in Banks
• Improve the agency business, and recruit new potential agents with company.
• Handling our national tie-up channel partner for motor business, Honda dealership & Nissan dealership.

detailed_profile.name: Shourya Singh
detailed_profile.position: Driving Sales Success at PolicyBazaar | Team Leader | Expert in E-commerce, Loans, & Insurance
detailed_profile.about: With over 5 and a half years of experience in sales across various domains including e-commerce products, personal loans, and insurance, I have honed a diverse skill set and a results-driven approach. My journey has been marked by a relentless drive to succeed and an unwavering commitment to excellence. Key Highlights: - **Sales Expertise:** Proven track record in driving sales and achieving significant milestones in e-commerce products, personal loans, and insurance. - **Leadership:** Proactive leadership with extensive experience in team management, coaching, and monitoring. Recognized with multiple Best Team Leader (TL) awards in RNR. - **Problem Solving & Data Analysis:** Strong problem-solving skills with a keen eye for data analysis and a solid understanding of MS Excel. - **Business Development:** Played a pivotal role in business development, implementing various strategies to boost sales and enhance performance. - **Achievements:** Consistently achieved and surpassed sales targets, resulting in three promotions within five years. - **Continuous Improvement:** Committed to continuous improvement, I have introduced several initiatives to enhance sales processes and outcomes. My never-give-up attitude, combined with a passion for mentoring and leading teams, has enabled me to create high-performing sales environments. I thrive on challenges and am always eager to leverage my skills to drive business growth and achieve exceptional results.

positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Partner with Product, Technology, and Compliance teams to design and implement digital-first workflows, ensuring seamless integration with existing platforms and real-time system updates. ‚Ä¢ Lead and oversee internal audits, quality assurance assignments, and risk-mitigation initiatives, ensuring strict adherence to IRDA guidelines and organizational policies. ‚Ä¢ Drive SOP development, process mapping, and automation initiatives, ensuring scalability and continuous improvement in customer-facing operations. ‚Ä¢ Monitor agent productivity, quality scores, and compliance adherence, providing structured feedback, daily hurdle meetings, and targeted training programs. ‚Ä¢ Act as a strategic liaison between operations, technology, and business stakeholders to resolve bottlenecks, ensure data accuracy, and deliver high-quality customer experiences. Key Achievements: ‚Ä¢ Reduced endorsement turnaround time (TAT) by 7‚Äì10 days through creation of a structured endorsement matrix and real-time system field updates. ‚Ä¢ Designed and implemented a step-by-step Guided Workflow, significantly reducing agent errors and standardizing customer communications. ‚Ä¢ Conducted root-cause analyses for compliance failures, coordinated corrective action plans, and established preventative controls with business and compliance teams. ‚Ä¢ Increased first-contact resolution rates by enabling agents to execute system updates during live customer interactions.
positions.title: Lead ops excellence
positions.description_html:
• Partner with Product, Technology, and Compliance teams to design and implement digital-first workflows,
ensuring seamless integration with existing platforms and real-time system updates.
• Lead and oversee internal audits, quality assurance assignments, and risk-mitigation initiatives, ensuring strict
adherence to IRDA guidelines and organizational policies.
• Drive SOP development, process mapping, and automation initiatives, ensuring scalability and continuous
improvement in customer-facing operations.
• Monitor agent productivity, quality scores, and compliance adherence, providing structured feedback, daily
hurdle meetings, and targeted training programs.
• Act as a strategic liaison between operations, technology, and business stakeholders to resolve bottlenecks,
ensure data accuracy, and deliver high-quality customer experiences.

Key Achievements:
• Reduced endorsement turnaround time (TAT) by 7–10 days through creation of a structured endorsement
matrix and real-time system field updates.
• Designed and implemented a step-by-step Guided Workflow, significantly reducing agent errors and
standardizing customer communications.
• Conducted root-cause analyses for compliance failures, coordinated corrective action plans, and established
preventative controls with business and compliance teams.
• Increased first-contact resolution rates by enabling agents to execute system updates during live customer
interactions.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Handled inbound and outbound customer queries on health insurance policies, providing accurate policy details, guidance on KYC processes, and resolution of service requests. ‚Ä¢ Verified and validated submitted customer KYC and policy documents, ensuring completeness and compliance with IRDA guidelines. ‚Ä¢ Collaborated with backend and operations teams to resolve discrepancies and accelerate policy issuance. ‚Ä¢ Maintained detailed logs of customer interactions, escalating issues to supervisors where necessary for prompt resolution. ‚Ä¢ Supported new joiners by sharing process knowledge and mentoring them on customer communication and verification protocols. Key Contributions: ‚Ä¢ Introduced a Guided Workflow integrated with website APIs, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual errors, and ensuring uniformity in customer handling. ‚Ä¢ Reduced policy rejections by improving verification standards, strengthening documentation review, and refining customer communication strategies. ‚Ä¢ Contributed to overall customer satisfaction and operational reliability through consistent accuracy and proactive customer engagement.
positions.title: Quality Analyst

• Handled inbound and outbound customer queries on health insurance policies, providing accurate policy
details, guidance on KYC processes, and resolution of service requests.

with IRDA guidelines.

resolution.

verification protocols.

Key Contributions:
• Introduced a Guided Workflow integrated with website APIs, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual errors, and
ensuring uniformity in customer handling.
• Reduced policy rejections by improving verification standards, strengthening documentation review, and
refining customer communication strategies.
• Contributed to overall customer satisfaction and operational reliability through consistent accuracy and
proactive customer engagement.

detailed_profile.name: Shourya Singh
detailed_profile.position: Driving Sales Success at PolicyBazaar | Team Leader | Expert in E-commerce, Loans, & Insurance
detailed_profile.about: With over 5 and a half years of experience in sales across various domains including e-commerce products, personal loans, and insurance, I have honed a diverse skill set and a results-driven approach. My journey has been marked by a relentless drive to succeed and an unwavering commitment to excellence. Key Highlights: - **Sales Expertise:** Proven track record in driving sales and achieving significant milestones in e-commerce products, personal loans, and insurance. - **Leadership:** Proactive leadership with extensive experience in team management, coaching, and monitoring. Recognized with multiple Best Team Leader (TL) awards in RNR. - **Problem Solving & Data Analysis:** Strong problem-solving skills with a keen eye for data analysis and a solid understanding of MS Excel. - **Business Development:** Played a pivotal role in business development, implementing various strategies to boost sales and enhance performance. - **Achievements:** Consistently achieved and surpassed sales targets, resulting in three promotions within five years. - **Continuous Improvement:** Committed to continuous improvement, I have introduced several initiatives to enhance sales processes and outcomes. My never-give-up attitude, combined with a passion for mentoring and leading teams, has enabled me to create high-performing sales environments. I thrive on challenges and am always eager to leverage my skills to drive business growth and achieve exceptional results.

Product Analytics: - ÔÉò Carry Out market research to identify opportunities to develop new products or make changes to existing products. ÔÉò Passion for number crunching, logical problem solving and intellectual challenges. Ensuring strict adherence of timelines and rigorous quality standards for each project.

‚Ä¢	Spearheaded a 9-wave project to help a Fortune 500 Tobacco company to identify shifts in the consumption behaviour of their consumers.

detailed_profile.about: ‚Ä¢ Dynamic and results-oriented Operations Excellence Leader with over 3 years of progressive experience driving process optimization, operational efficiency, and business transformation. Skilled in leading internal audits, developing and implementing scalable SOPs, and ensuring alignment of operational processes with overall business objectives. Recognized for improving first-time resolution rates, enhancing customer satisfaction, and delivering measurable results through data-driven decision-making and cross-functional collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Proficient in Power BI (data extraction and analysis), PowerPoint, Excel, Google Sheets, and Google Docs, with a strong ability to translate data into actionable insights and executive-level reports. Adept at stakeholder management, building strong relationships across departments, and supporting digital transformation initiatives that streamline operations and improve organizational performance ‚Ä¢ I am currently seeking new opportunities where I can leveragemy expertise in operational excellence, process improvement, and business analytics to contribute to organizational growth, drive innovation, and deliver sustainable results. Technical skills - * Data & Reporting Tools: Microsoft Excel (Advanced), Google Sheets, Power BI (Data extraction & reporting) * Documentation & Presentation: Google Docs, Microsoft PowerPoint, MS Office Suite * Business & Operations: SOP Documentation, Call Quality Assurance (QA) Evaluation, Email & Business * Communication Etiquette * Collaboration Platforms: Google Workspace, MicrosoftOffice 365 Core competencies - * Operational Strategy & Execution ‚Äì Driving efficiency, scalability, and alignment with business objectives. * Internal Audits & Risk Mitigation (IRDA Compliance) ‚Äì Conducting auditsto ensure adherence to regulatory * guidelines and minimizing operational risks. * SOP Design & Process Mapping ‚Äì Creating scalable Standard Operating Proceduresto streamline workflows and * standardize best practices. * Data-Driven Decision Making ‚Äì Leveraging analytics and reporting to inform strategic initiatives and optimize * performance outcomes. * End-to-End KYC & Verification Automation ‚Äì Implementing automation solutionsto strengthen compliance, reduced AHT tat. * Performance Coaching & Leadership ‚Äì Guiding and mentoring teamsto enhance productivity, accountability, and * BusinessIntelligence & Reporting Tools ‚Äì Skilled in Power BI (data extraction), Excel, and Master Management * Dashboards (e.g., city addition in health operations) Regards, Arunathakur387@gmail.com 8860181524

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Partner with Product, Technology, and Compliance teams to design and implement digital-first workflows, ensuring seamless integration with existing platforms and real-time system updates. ‚Ä¢ Lead and oversee internal audits, quality assurance assignments, and risk-mitigation initiatives, ensuring strict adherence to IRDA guidelines and organizational policies. ‚Ä¢ Drive SOP development, process mapping, and automation initiatives, ensuring scalability and continuous improvement in customer-facing operations. ‚Ä¢ Monitor agent productivity, quality scores, and compliance adherence, providing structured feedback, daily hurdle meetings, and targeted training programs. ‚Ä¢ Act as a strategic liaison between operations, technology, and business stakeholders to resolve bottlenecks, ensure data accuracy, and deliver high-quality customer experiences. Key Achievements: ‚Ä¢ Reduced endorsement turnaround time (TAT) by 7‚Äì10 days through creation of a structured endorsement matrix and real-time system field updates. ‚Ä¢ Designed and implemented a step-by-step Guided Workflow, significantly reducing agent errors and standardizing customer communications. ‚Ä¢ Conducted root-cause analyses for compliance failures, coordinated corrective action plans, and established preventative controls with business and compliance teams. ‚Ä¢ Increased first-contact resolution rates by enabling agents to execute system updates during live customer interactions.
positions.title: Lead ops excellence
positions.description_html:
• Partner with Product, Technology, and Compliance teams to design and implement digital-first workflows,
ensuring seamless integration with existing platforms and real-time system updates.
• Lead and oversee internal audits, quality assurance assignments, and risk-mitigation initiatives, ensuring strict
adherence to IRDA guidelines and organizational policies.
• Drive SOP development, process mapping, and automation initiatives, ensuring scalability and continuous
improvement in customer-facing operations.
• Monitor agent productivity, quality scores, and compliance adherence, providing structured feedback, daily
hurdle meetings, and targeted training programs.
• Act as a strategic liaison between operations, technology, and business stakeholders to resolve bottlenecks,
ensure data accuracy, and deliver high-quality customer experiences.

Key Achievements:
• Reduced endorsement turnaround time (TAT) by 7–10 days through creation of a structured endorsement
matrix and real-time system field updates.
• Designed and implemented a step-by-step Guided Workflow, significantly reducing agent errors and
standardizing customer communications.
• Conducted root-cause analyses for compliance failures, coordinated corrective action plans, and established
preventative controls with business and compliance teams.
• Increased first-contact resolution rates by enabling agents to execute system updates during live customer
interactions.

positions.subtitle: Policybazaar.com
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Handled inbound and outbound customer queries on health insurance policies, providing accurate policy details, guidance on KYC processes, and resolution of service requests. ‚Ä¢ Verified and validated submitted customer KYC and policy documents, ensuring completeness and compliance with IRDA guidelines. ‚Ä¢ Collaborated with backend and operations teams to resolve discrepancies and accelerate policy issuance. ‚Ä¢ Maintained detailed logs of customer interactions, escalating issues to supervisors where necessary for prompt resolution. ‚Ä¢ Supported new joiners by sharing process knowledge and mentoring them on customer communication and verification protocols. Key Contributions: ‚Ä¢ Introduced a Guided Workflow integrated with website APIs, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual errors, and ensuring uniformity in customer handling. ‚Ä¢ Reduced policy rejections by improving verification standards, strengthening documentation review, and refining customer communication strategies. ‚Ä¢ Contributed to overall customer satisfaction and operational reliability through consistent accuracy and proactive customer engagement.
positions.title: Quality Analyst
positions.description_html:
• Handled inbound and outbound customer queries on health insurance policies, providing accurate policy
details, guidance on KYC processes, and resolution of service requests.
• Verified and validated submitted customer KYC and policy documents, ensuring completeness and compliance
with IRDA guidelines.
• Collaborated with backend and operations teams to resolve discrepancies and accelerate policy issuance.
• Maintained detailed logs of customer interactions, escalating issues to supervisors where necessary for prompt
resolution.
• Supported new joiners by sharing process knowledge and mentoring them on customer communication and
verification protocols.

Key Contributions:
• Introduced a Guided Workflow integrated with website APIs, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual errors, and
ensuring uniformity in customer handling.
• Reduced policy rejections by improving verification standards, strengthening documentation review, and
refining customer communication strategies.
• Contributed to overall customer satisfaction and operational reliability through consistent accuracy and
proactive customer engagement.

positions.subtitle: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.
positions.description: Company: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd. (Universal Sompo) - a joint venture (JV) between Allahabad Bank, Sompo Japan Insurance Inc., Indian Overseas Bank, Karnataka Bank and Dabur Investments - Universal Sompo is a uniquely symbolic example of fruitful Public-Private sector partnerships. Profit Centre Manager whereby key functions are developing channels like Brokers, Agents, and Motor Dealers to increase the penetration and thus increase the business volume in addition to our promoter banks Bancassurance business and new co-operative bank tie-ups. Ensure best services in terms of deliverables like claims, policy delivery managing payouts and providing knowledge in terms of insurance. ‚Ä¢ Experience in establishing the market for the organization. ‚Ä¢ In depth knowledge of all the products & services. ‚Ä¢ Experience in managing business operations in diversified products. ‚Ä¢ Experience in managing all facets of business from marketing, general administration, human resources and operations. ‚Ä¢ Received management accolades as regards to performance and posed confidence in me by allowing me to continue in the branch of USGI for six & half years and eventually made me Head of the Branch in April 2015 at Karnal. ‚Ä¢ Generate the growth every year in Bancassurance and generate profit , selling the co branded products/cross sell products in Banks ‚Ä¢ Improve the agency business, and recruit new potential agents with company. ‚Ä¢ Handling our national tie-up channel partner for motor business, Honda dealership & Nissan dealership.
positions.title: Branch Manager
positions.description_html:
Company: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd. (Universal Sompo) - a joint venture (JV) between Allahabad Bank, Sompo Japan Insurance Inc., Indian Overseas Bank, Karnataka Bank and Dabur Investments - Universal Sompo is a uniquely symbolic example of fruitful Public-Private sector partnerships.

Profit Centre Manager whereby key functions are developing channels like Brokers, Agents, and Motor Dealers to increase the penetration and thus increase the business volume in addition to our promoter banks Bancassurance business and new co-operative bank tie-ups. Ensure best services in terms of deliverables like claims, policy delivery managing payouts and providing knowledge in terms of insurance.

• Experience in establishing the market for the organization.
• In depth knowledge of all the products & services.
• Experience in managing business operations in diversified products.
• Experience in managing all facets of business from marketing, general administration, human resources and operations.
• Received management accolades as regards to performance and posed confidence in me by allowing me to continue in the branch of USGI for six & half years and eventually made me Head of the Branch in April 2015 at Karnal.
• Generate the growth every year in Bancassurance and generate profit , selling the co branded products/cross sell products in Banks
• Improve the agency business, and recruit new potential agents with company.
• Handling our national tie-up channel partner for motor business, Honda dealership & Nissan dealership.

positions.subtitle: Universal Sompo General Insurance Co. Ltd.
